description:
While looking for Naraku Kikyo meets Kansuke, an old bandit. Kansuke is seriously ill and is trying to find a place to die. Fifty years ago, he was convinced by one of his bandit buddies, Onigumo, into attacking a priestess who protected the Sacred Jewel.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Meguru Kikyou no Kodoku na Tabiji
めぐる桔梗の孤独な旅路
